Cf/Depth Charge





After many shots the power fails and the shield shatter. The shields 
are down.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Depth Charge flys into the base. He gets to the first panel he could 
get to. He puts the base into lockdown and activates the internal 
defense system.
